ShortDescription.Value: Provide i18n injector for every mods

Publish.LongDescription:
# I18n EveryWhere
Provides convenient localization features to reduce the burden on authors and provide centralized coverage.
Keeps authors from being overwhelmed by
- Self-implemented language file loading - Handling different text encodings
## Usage:
1. Create a new "lang" folder in the mod folder. 2. Add localization json, like en-US.json, zh-HANS.json.
